page.title: 08Commuting to work
page.content: As our grid squares cover a rural area we wished to find out whether people travelled to{work}in other towns or worked locally.To do this we{ {interviewed}local residents of the four main villages ( Upper and Lower Cumberworth,Denby Dale,Skelmanthorpe). Our survey results showed that many { people worked in Huddersfield and the surrounding districts and those who worked further afield eg Sheffield, Manchester, Leeds lived where there was good access to major routes and also occupied larger detached houses. There is also a significant number of {retired people}for whom housing and welfare provisions are made. Increases in the level of commuting are due mainly to the comparatively low housing costs, the increase in car ownership and the general improvement in trunk and motorway routes.
